question: Who among the following authors wrote "Tarikh-i-Mubarak Shah"?
explanation:
On the history of the Sayyid dynasty (1414-1451 AD), \"Tarikh-i-Mubarak Shah\" is the only contemporary source discovered so
far. It was written by Yahaya bin Ahmed Sirhindi.The book begins with the rise of the Ghori dynasty and the conquest of theÂ  northern India by the turks.
